member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator
member.summary: The ConditionOperator enumeration type specifies the possible values for the condition operator in a condition expression.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.Between
member.summary: Specifies that the value is between two values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.Equal
member.summary: Specifies that two expressions are compared for equality.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.EqualBusinessId
member.summary: Specifies that the value is equal to the specified business ID.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.EqualUserId
member.summary: Specifies that the value is equal to the specified user ID.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.EqualUserLanguage
member.summary: Specifies that the value is equal to the language for the user.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.GreaterEqual
member.summary: Specifies that two expressions are compared for greater than or equal to conditions.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.GreaterThan
member.summary: Specifies that two expressions are compared for the greater than condition.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.In
member.summary: Specifies that a given value is matched to a value in a list.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.Last7Days
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of last seven days including today.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LastMonth
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consist of last month including first day of the last month and last day of the last month.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LastWeek
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of previous week including Sunday through Saturday.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LastXDays
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of last X days.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LastXHours
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of last X hours.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LastXMonths
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of last X months.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LastXWeeks
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of last X weeks.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LastXYears
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of last X years.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LastYear
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of previous year.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LessEqual
member.summary: Specifies that two expressions are compared for greater than or equal to conditions.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.LessThan
member.summary: Specifies that two expressions are compared for a less than condition.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.Like
member.summary: Specifies that the character string is matched to a specified pattern.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.Next7Days
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of the next seven days.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NextMonth
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of next month.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NextWeek
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of next week.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NextXDays
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of the next X days.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NextXHours
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of the next X hours.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NextXMonths
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of the next X months.

member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of the next X weeks.

member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of the next X years.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NextYear
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of next year.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NotBetween
member.summary: Specifies that the value is not between two values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NotEqual
member.summary: Specifies that two expressions are compared for inequality.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NotEqualBusinessId
member.summary: Specifies that the value is not equal to the specified business ID.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NotEqualUserId
member.summary: Specifies that the value is not equal to the specified user ID.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NotIn
member.summary: Specifies that a given value is not matched to a value in a subquery or a list.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NotLike
member.summary: Specifies that the character string is matched to a specified pattern.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NotNull
member.summary: Specifies that the value is not null.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.NotOn
member.summary: Specifies that the value is not on the specified date.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.Null
member.summary: Specifies that the value is null.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.OlderThanXMonths
member.summary: Specifies that the value is older than the specified number of months.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.On
member.summary: Specifies that a value is on a specified date.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.OnOrAfter
member.summary: Specifies that a value is on or after a specified date.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.OnOrBefore
member.summary: Specifies that a value is on or before a specified date.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.ThisMonth
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of this month.

member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of the current week.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.ConditionOperator.ThisYear
member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of the current year.

member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of today.

member.summary: Specifies that a date range consists of tomorrow.

member.summary: Adds a condition to the filter expression setting the attribute name, condition operator, and value array.

member.summary: Adds a child filter to the filter expression.

member.summary: Adds a child filter to the filter expression setting the logical operator.

member.summary: Gets condition expressions that include attributes, condition operators, and attribute values.

member.summary: Gets or sets logical AND/OR filter operators.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.FilterExpression.Filters
member.summary: Gets a hierarchy of condition and logical filter expressions that filter the results of the query.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.JoinOperator
member.summary: The JoinOperator enumeration type specifies the possible values for a join operator in a .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.JoinOperator.Inner
member.summary: Specifies that the values in the attributes being joined are compared using a comparison operator.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.JoinOperator.LeftOuter
member.summary: Specifies that all instances of the entity in the FROM clause are returned if they meet WHERE or HAVING search conditions.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.JoinOperator.Natural
member.summary: Specifies that only one value of the two joined attributes is returned if an equal-join operation is performed and the two values are identical.

member.summary: Gets the links between multiple entity types.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ascending or descending order.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Query.OrderType.Ascending
member.summary: Specifies that the values of the specified attribute should be sorted in ascending order, from lowest to highest.

member.summary: Specifies that the values of the specified attribute should be sorted in descending order, from highest to lowest.
